name: Triad Advertising
tagline: A new kind of integrated agency
description:
TRIAD Advertising is now 11 years on the market. We’re ranked among the TOP 10 ad agencies in Slovak Republic. Currently employing over 100 people in Slovakia and Czech Republic.
We are working for major international but for smaller local accounts as well, realising various of our services from brand building and branding, development of communication strategies, campaign creative,  complete ATL, BTL production and media up to full service digital advertising.
